entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: West Vancouver 06:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. 40 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain this morning. Clearing this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain before morning overnight then 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10 except 15 inland. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. 30 percent chance of wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. Clearing in the morning.
